H0.text: The Australian Tennis Open is played in what city. Sydney

H1.text: The Australian Tennis Open is played in what city. Perth

H2.text: The Australian Tennis Open is played in what city. Brisbane

H3.text: The Australian Tennis Open is played in what city. Melb

A4.text: The tournament has been held at the Melbourne Park complex since 1988.

A5.text: The Australian Open is played at Melbourne Park, which is located in the Melbourne Sports and Entertainment Precinct; the event moved to this site in 1988.
